rule.Name: AvoidVisibleNestedTypesRule
rule.problem: This type is both nested and visible outside the assembly. Nested types are often confused with namespaces.
rule.solution: Change the nested type to be invisible outside the assembly or un-nest it.

rule.Name: CompareWithEmptyStringEfficientlyRule
rule.problem: This method compares a string with an empty string by using the Equals method or the equality (==) or inequality (!=) operators.
rule.solution: Compare String.Length with 0 instead. The string length is known and it's faster to compare integers than to compare strings.

rule.Name: ConsiderUsingStaticTypeRule
rule.problem: This type contains only static fields and methods and should be static.
rule.solution: Change this type into a static type to gain clarity and better error reporting.

rule.Name: DoNotDestroyStackTraceRule
rule.problem: A catch block throws the exception it caught which destroys the original stack trace.
rule.solution: Use 'throw;' instead of 'throw ex;'

rule.Name: DoNotSwallowErrorsCatchingNonSpecificExceptionsRule
rule.problem: This method catches a very general exception without rethrowing it. This is not safe to do in general and may mask problems that the caller should be made aware of.
rule.solution: Rethrow the original exception (which will preserve the stacktrace of the original error) or catch a more specific exception type.

rule.Name: EnsureLocalDisposalRule
rule.problem: This disposable local is not guaranteed to be disposed of before the method returns.
rule.solution: Use a 'using' statement or surround the local's usage with a try/finally block.

rule.Name: MarkAssemblyWithCLSCompliantRule
rule.problem: This assembly is not decorated with the [CLSCompliant] attribute.
rule.solution: Add this attribute to ease the use (or non-use) of your assembly by CLS consumers.

rule.Name: MethodCanBeMadeStaticRule
rule.problem: This method does not use any instance fields, properties or methods and can be made static.
rule.solution: Make the method static.

rule.Name: NonConstantStaticFieldsShouldNotBeVisibleRule
rule.problem: This type has some static fields that are not constant. They may represent problems in multithreaded applications.
rule.solution: Change the field to read-only, or mark it [ThreadStatic], or make it non visible outside the assembly.

rule.Name: ProvideCorrectArgumentsToFormattingMethodsRule
rule.problem: You are calling a Format method without the correct arguments. This could result in a FormatException being thrown.
rule.solution: Pass the correct arguments to the formatting method.

target.defect: You are calling String.Format without arguments, you can remove the call to String.Format
Extra parameters are provided to String.Format, 23 provided but only 10 expected

rule.Name: ReviewSelfAssignmentRule
rule.problem: This method assigns a variable or field to itself.
rule.solution: Verify the code logic. This is likely a typo resulting in an incorrect assignment.
